content.description: The structural formula of the glycinium cation is shown above. Arrows indicate the <math alttext="p K sub a" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> values for the labile protons in the molecule.
content.question: What is the approximate <math alttext="H O C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>H</mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext>O</mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> bond angle in the glycinium cation?

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
